function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Uncertain range of projected infection due to exposure time and location.","Impact":"Overestimation or underestimation of infection risks, leading to ineffective measures.","Mitigation":"Use larger sample sizes and consider influential factors for more accurate projections.","Technologies":"Data analytics and modeling tools for trend analysis and pattern recognition.","People":"Public transportation passengers, classroom attendees, office workers, restaurant staff and patrons.","Owner":"Researchers, public health authorities, and urban planners."}]}
